Html:
My question is, how I can limit zoomslider a number x?

I think this is the part where it is in file pivotviewer-0.8.27.min.js

v = new PivotViewer.ZoomController(n, k.MainPanelDimensions().height);
	var s = S;
	m = e(".pv-toolbarpanel-zoomslider"),
		m.slider({
			max : 100,
			slide : function (e, r) {
				var i = v.maxScale * r.value * .01;
				i = i < 1 ? 1 : i,
				v.zoom(n / 2, t / 2, i),
				s = r.value
			}
		});
Version 0.8.27 isn't available under the GPLv2 licence, please contact me for more details.
